alert.note: Alert for Allegan (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 5:48PM EDT until April 04 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Allegan County in southwestern Michigan... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 548 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southwest of Fennville, or 9 miles northeast of South Haven, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Allegan... Wayland... Fennville... Dorr... Ganges... Hamilton... Douglas... Hopkins... Burnips... Bradley... Pullman... Green Lake... Shelbyville... Allegan Municipal Ai... Glenn... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
